references.paper_title: Robust speech recognition via large-scale weak supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces the original Whisper model, which is the primary subject of the comparative analysis performed in this study.

references.paper_title: Investigation of whisper asr hallucinations induced by non-speech audio
references.reason: This paper explores hallucinations in Whisper transcriptions, which is one of the motivating problems of the main study.

references.paper_title: Librispeech: an asr corpus based on public domain audio books
references.reason: This paper introduces the LibriSpeech dataset, which this main study relies upon for testing and experimentation.

references.paper_title: ggerganov/whisper.cpp: Port of openai's whisper model in c/c++
references.reason: This paper introduces the C++ implementation of Whisper, which is lightweight, with built in quantization features.

references.paper_title: A survey of quantization methods for efficient neural network inference
references.reason: This paper provides background on quantization methods, which is the main method for improving efficiency and resource use of the ASR models.
